case.name: Patterson v Repatriation Commission [2006] FCA 538 (12 May 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: incapacity arising from war-caused injury or disease
connexion between incapacity and war service
commission required to find incapacity war-caused unless satisfied beyond reasonable doubt that no sufficient ground for so finding
commission required to be so satisfied if of opinion that material does not raise reasonable hypothesis connecting incapacity with service
death of veteran from cancer of unknown aetiology
necessity for "reasonable hypothesis" linking death to war service
relevance of evidence of quantum of exposure
methodology of respondent's expert witness in commenting upon hypothesis advanced on behalf of applicant.
